thread.section_title: Andaz Wall Street - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: One night stay
thread.title_full: One night stay - Review of Andaz Wall Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jslavitt34
title: One night stay
text: We had a wedding downtown so picked the hyatt andaz mostly because we had a free room from our hyatt credit card...rooms are very modern and well done...great use of space...free mini bar (ex alcohol) and 24 hr coffee, tea are nice touches...offered me late checkout without me asking...just a nice touch...would definitely stay here again, they get it...the $ is much more attractive then the Ritz (downtown) and in my opinion its on the same level...
